channel.title: Migrate a user’s password :: DevDocs Navigation Menu Test
channel.description: Migrate a user’s password Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Page ID: 60 Is this a new page?: Existing doc: changes are needed to update the doc and to fit the new IA Target personas: Internal app builders, Saas Builder Changes to be made: Update title Links to original docs: Password import inline hook: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/password-import-inline-hook/nodejs/main/ Why is this here?: Based on the GroupIt game from Oktane, “Inline hooks” was categorized almost equally between automate and customize, with Automate edging out.
